[//]: # (title: "Comprehensive String Guide")

[//]: # (---)

# Test Title

In this guide, we cover string operations, formatting, and manipulation techniques across multiple languages, including Kotlin.

## What is a String?

A string is a sequence of characters. It's one of the most common data types used to represent textual data in programming.

### Basic String Declaration (Kotlin)

```kotlin
val greeting: String = "Hello, World!"
println(greeting)
